name: pyrolysis
content:

Add to word list
a process in which substances are changed chemically by high temperatures: The company uses pyrolysis to convert used plastic into original monomer-like substances. Pyrolysis is a technique used to break chemical bonds of molecules by the use of thermal energy only.
More examplesFewer examplesThe heating process, known as pyrolysis, fused the metal particles together.Then the chips are fed into the pyrolysis process to separate the carbon black and the oil component.The pyrolysis plant would be used to recycle tyres by shredding them and then breaking down the materials through high heat.
